title: Only Have 20 Minutes? Three Short Workouts to Squeeze in During the Holiday Rush
sub_head: You donâ€™t need to spend hours in the gym this season
body:
Food-and-drink-filled celebrations, hectic holiday schedules, shorter daylight hours and colder weather make it tough to find time to burn off calories.
Shifting your mind-set can help, says KayLoni Olson, an assistant professor in the Department of Psychiatry and Human Behavior at the Warren Alpert Medical School of Brown University.
